titleStmt.title: The Apophthegmes of the ancients taken out of Plutarch, Diogenes Laertius, Elian, Atheneus, Stobeus, Macrobius and others : collected into one volume for the benefit and pleasure of the ingenious.
titleStmt.author: Bulteel, John, fl. 1683.
Plutarch. Selections. English.
Diogenes Laertius.

notesStmt.note: The second ed., 1686, has title: A collection of apothegmes or sayings of the ancients.
This item appears at reel 221:22 as Wing P2631 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 2281:22 as Wing (2nd ed.) A3560B
Reproduction of originals in Yale University Library and British Library.
